name: slack_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries in Slack in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling slack_search_messages multiple times. Pass queries as a comma-separated string.

detailSteps.code: const localConfig = localStorage.getItem('localConfig_v2'); if (!localConfig) return { status: 'error', message: 'Not logged in' }; const config = JSON.parse(localConfig); const teamId = Object.keys(config.teams)[0]; const token = config.teams[teamId].token; const query = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get('_q') || ''; const resp = await fetch('/api/search.messages', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + token, 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' }, body: 'query=' + encodeURIComponent(query) + '&count=5' }); const data = await resp.json(); const messages = (data.messages?.matches || []).map(m => ({ text: m.text?.substring(0, 150) || '', username: m.username || '', channel: m.channel?.name || '' })); return { query: query, total: data.messages?.total || 0, result_count: messages.length, messages: messages }
detailSteps.name: search_result
detailSteps.label: Search messages
